LanguageData.ZT.Settings.Header: Zhul Tribe - The Curled Ones Settings
LanguageData.ZT.RitualFrequency.Title: Ritual Frequency
LanguageData.ZT.RitualFrequency.Desc: How often Zhul grooming and cannibalistic rituals occur each in-game day.
LanguageData.ZT.CaravanLootMultiplier.Title: Caravan Loot Multiplier
LanguageData.ZT.CaravanLootMultiplier.Desc: Multiplier for loot from Zhul caravans and quest rewards.
LanguageData.ZT.RaidFrequency.Title: Raid Frequency
LanguageData.ZT.RaidFrequency.Desc: How often Zhul tribes launch raids against player colonies (1=Rare, 5=Very Frequent).
LanguageData.ZT.RecruitmentDifficulty.Title: Recruitment Difficulty
LanguageData.ZT.RecruitmentDifficulty.Desc: How difficult it is to recruit captured Zhul prisoners (0.5=Easy, 2.0=Very Hard).
LanguageData.ZT.BloodOilVisual.Title: Blood Oil Visuals
LanguageData.ZT.BloodOilVisual.Desc: Toggle swirling blood-oil motes and glow effects during grooming ceremonies.
LanguageData.ZT.TerrorEffects.Title: Terror Effects
LanguageData.ZT.TerrorEffects.Desc: Enable special visual effects when Zhul tribes approach to strike fear into enemies.
LanguageData.ZT.AudioVolume.Title: Audio Volume
LanguageData.ZT.AudioVolume.Desc: Volume level for Zhul tribal chants, bone drums, and ritual sounds.
LanguageData.ZT.AudioDistance.Title: Audio Distance
LanguageData.ZT.AudioDistance.Desc: How far Zhul audio effects can be heard across the map.
LanguageData.ZT.AdvancedQuests.Title: Advanced Quest Chains
LanguageData.ZT.AdvancedQuests.Desc: Enable complex multi-part quest chains involving Zhul artifacts and rituals.
LanguageData.ZT.CustomBackstories.Title: Zhul Backstories
LanguageData.ZT.CustomBackstories.Desc: Allow pawns to spawn with Zhul-specific backgrounds and traits.
